Reviews.Title: “Avoid this hotel even at the low price”

Reviews.Content: stayed 12 nights horrible read hotel noisy cant bad noisy alot noise coming hotels icecream store below techno music 4am ear plugs help stay hotel 14 lounge chairs 11 guests 150 tukan guest lounge chair stay hotel beach club crazy busy loung chair stay hotel dirty noisy extras tukan available hotels playa del carmen management staff treat advance warning hotel saved unpleasant vacation advise stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the price”
Reviews.Author: connie h
Reviews.Content: pdc yesterday stayed 4 nights clean roomy looking luxury hotel looking safe clean cheap read reviews noise extremely quiet stay 9 am construction door didnt matter suggest bring own wash cloth beds typical hard rock mexico beds clean shower pressure plenty hot water enjoyed stay location front desk friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “good hotel, very noisy location”

Reviews.Content: clean furnished mexican style tv table bed 2 chairs 2 chairs balcony cleaned day socket electric european guests swimming pool beach club tukan hotel owner localization nightmare looking quiet vacation hotel located main touristic street playa dc walking balcony music plays late night hours drunk americans screaming 6 am mention couple 27 nice sleep vacation
